MFNType

String with the name of a method for computing matrix functions.

Synopsis

typedef const char* MFNType;
#define MFNKRYLOV   "krylov"
#define MFNEXPOKIT  "expokit"

See Also

MFNSetType(), MFN

Location: include/slepcmfn.h
